note.p: American Baptist minister and educator. Professor of rhetoric and logic, Kalamazoo College, Michigan, 1865; president of Franklin College, Indiana, 1870–2. Edited Baptist newspapers, 1872–98. Son of Francis Wayland (1796–1865).
Jen Snoots 2006, Heman Lincoln Wayland (1830–1898), Find a grave, www.findagrave.com (accessed 28 March 2013)
